name: pip
readme:
This plugin adds a script for automatically creating a virtual environment using `venv` for python3 projects, so you can install packages with pip as normal.
To activate the environment, run `source $VENV_DIR/bin/activate` or add it to the init_hook of your devbox.json
To change where your virtual environment is created, modify the $VENV_DIR environment variable in your init_hook
